name: Tiny Toast
description:
Description:

  • Tiny Toast is the tragic tale of the end bit of bread as he fights for his survival against relentless waves of sandwich fillings. As the runt of the loaf, his singular quest is to hold off against his pursuants as long as he can in this valiant last stand. Join Tiny Toast as he staves off his ultimate destiny of becoming a yeasty stack of sustenance.

Fact Sheet:

  • Developer: IH8Bread Productions
  • Release Date: February 16th, 2016(Windows)
  • Platforms: Windows
  • Price: Free :D
  • Availability: Digital Download on Steam Workshop, GameJolt and Itch.io
  • File Size: 4.5mb (PC)
  • Press Contact: IH8BreadProductions@hotmail.com

Key Features:

  • Non-contrived, painstakingly hand-animated retro style graphics!
  • Fast-paced, bread based action!
  • See the true nature of sandwich fillings!
  • Easy pick up and play gameplay!
  • High scores!
  • Things fly out of enemies when you hit them!
  • COINS!!!
